properties.Name: RevolvingAccountPeriodStatus
properties.Description: The status and amount owed on the revolving account as of the associated date.

Columns.Name: ReportingDate
Columns.Description: The date of the associated status.

Columns.Name: CreditGrantorId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Credit Grantor.

Columns.Name: ReportingPeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period starting date associated with the status.

Columns.Name: ReportingPeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period ending date associated with the status.

Columns.Name: AccountPeriodHighBalanceAmount
Columns.Description: The high balance amount of the account for the associated period.

Columns.Name: AccountTotalBalanceAmount
Columns.Description: The total amount of the account for the associated period.

Columns.Name: AccountLimitAmount
Columns.Description: The account limit amount for the associated period.

Columns.Name: RevolvingAccountPeriodStatusNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the revolving account.

Columns.Name: AccountStatusId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Account Status.

Columns.Name: BillingCycleId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Billing Cycle.
